group_1.narration: That's the wish I asked Kyubey for@back when I became a Magical Girlâ€¦
My intention was to confess and ask him out, but...

group_1.textLeft: ... Alright, I'll go out with you.
Really!? Thank you! I'm so happy...!

group_1.narration: My characteristic bad timing sadly@marked the end of my first love.
... No. It did end, right?@Because if it keeps going, then that would mean...

group_1.textRight: Does giving up mean your love wasn't serious?
(I wonder why I can't deny it...)
(It's almost like deep inside of me, I already@know the answer...)

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right... [chara:800200:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:800200:cheek_0][chara:800200:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:800200:lipSynch_1]thank you so much!
It's because you listened to what I had to say,@that I was able to sort out my feelings.
What I just said, those are my true feelings.

group_1.textRight: (That's right, that was my original intention...)
(How did just listening to her have such a big@impact on her emotions?)

group_1.textLeft: I'll give it my all one more time. After that,@I'll give up.

group_1.textRight: It seems like you had a bit of a conversation.@How did that go?

group_1.textLeft: Aah, it turned into a love talk.
Well, it seems she got back to her feet after@repenting.

group_1.textRight: What kind of love talk was that?

group_1.narration: That girl went home without trouble, but...
In my heart, a strange feeling remained...

group_1.textCenter: Because I like him even if he already has someone.
If I could give up on him that easily...
Then, that would mean my love isn't serious.

group_1.narration: Haha... I hadn't thought about that...@Never looked at it that way.
The way that girl said those things...@Made it look like me,
who had retired so soon,@wasn't serious about her love.
I wonder if I should have done more back then...
